RAW.SOURCE:
` *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Report YGPL_MT_GENERIC_TASK_LAUNCHER *---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ygpl_mt_generic_task_launcher.
PARAMETERS: p_class TYPE seoclsname OBLIGATORY, p_runid TYPE ygpl_mt_run=>td_process_id.
START-OF-SELECTION. DATA o_cx TYPE REF TO cx_root. DATA err_msg TYPE string. DATA o_handler TYPE REF TO ygpl_mt_data_bloc.
TRY. CREATE OBJECT o_handler. o_handler->create_task_and_handler( handler_classname = p_class run_id = p_runid ). CATCH ygpl_mt_cx INTO o_cx. err_msg = o_cx->get_longtext( ). WRITE err_msg. MESSAGE err_msg TYPE 'E'. CATCH cx_root INTO o_cx. err_msg = o_cx->get_longtext( ). WRITE err_msg. MESSAGE err_msg TYPE 'A'. ENDTRY.
o_handler->task->process_objects( ).
END-OF-SELECTION.
